items.sentence: I don\'t like it when people ask me to do things for them.
Tom and Mary still live in Boston where they both grew up.
Tom and Mary want you to find someone to babysit for them.
My older brother often stayed up all night reading novels.
Would you please go to the supermarket and buy some bread?
You learn a lot about your own country if you live abroad.
The Mississippi is the longest river in the United States.
How long do you think it would take you to read this book?
How old were you when you fell in love for the first time?
If you had wanted our help, why didn\'t you ask us for it?
I\'d like for Tom to tell you what he did on Friday night.
I\'d like for Tom to tell you where he was two nights ago.
Roads in the country aren\'t as busy as those in the city.
Tom went out of his way to make sure Mary had a good time.
I wake up at six, but I don\'t get out of bed until seven.
I wish that I could\'ve eaten at that restaurant with you.
My house isn\'t very large, but it\'s large enough for me.
Tom gave the man who came to the door both food and money.
Please continue with your story. It\'s really interesting.
I forgot to turn off the television before going to sleep.
Tom can swim a lot better than I thought he\'d be able to.
Tom doesn\'t understand why Mary behaves the way she does.
There\'s a possibility Tom won\'t go to Australia with us.
I\'d like to thank you for everything you\'ve done for me.
You\'re the only Canadian I know that doesn\'t like bacon.
You\'re the only one who knows how to get to Tom\'s house.
Why in the world are you doing that at this time of night?
Tom doesn\'t have a very good Japanese-English dictionary.
If you want to make your dreams come true, keep on trying.
Tom helps Mary because he wants to, not because he has to.
Tom\'s picture is on the front page of today\'s newspaper.
I\'m not feeling well. Could you please send for a doctor?
That might not be as heavy as you think it\'s going to be.
I didn\'t want to spend any more time looking for my keys.
Tom was the only one who knew the combination to the safe.
Tom lived in that small house for a little over ten years.
Tom spent most of the morning straightening up his office.
Which of the books did you think was the most interesting?
I wish we could talk in person, but that\'ll have to wait.
I hate to tell you this, but Tom doesn\'t really like you.
Tom had changed so much that I didn\'t even recognize him.
The reason that happened was because you weren\'t careful.
I\'m still not used to getting up so early in the morning.
I\'ve made up my mind to work for a company in the States.
If I had a dime for every time I heard that, I\'d be rich.
Tom wanted to make sure that nothing bad happened to Mary.
Tom wanted to talk to Mary about what was going to happen.
Tom wants to find a place to live close to where he works.
Tom was a truck driver before he became a race car driver.
I don\'t know anybody who hasn\'t been sick at least once.
